#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int reverse(int n){
	int a = 0;
	while(n != 0){
		a = a*10 + n%10;
		n = n/10;
	}
	return a;
}


int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
		int a,b;
		cin >> a >> b;
		cout << reverse(reverse(a) + reverse(b)) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
